summary: Highly organized and detail-oriented Staff Assistant with over 14 years of experience providing administrative support to senior executives. Skilled in calendar management, communications, travel coordination, meeting minutes, and office operations.

experience.title: Staff Assistant
experience.description: Provided administrative support to the CISO and staff, including calendaring and scheduling using dCal, Lotus Notes, and shared calendars; telephone screening; travel arrangements with expense reconciliations; meeting materials and minutes; leave reports; procurement card receipts; vendor liaison; and A/V support. Backups included inventory management, mail distribution, receptionist coverage, and event planning.

experience.title: Receptionist
experience.description: Answered and directed incoming calls; issued parking passes and visitor badges; greeted visitors; handled packages; leave tracking; maintained telephone directory; provided support to Staff Assistants.

experience.title: Deputy Clerk
experience.description: Ordered and distributed office supplies; managed vendors, organization, and upkeep; directed guests and routed deliveries; answered and managed calls; opened and distributed incoming mail; greeted visitors, including VIPs and vendors.

experience.title: Legal Secretary
experience.description: Prepared court motions and orders; customer service; billing/accounting; extensive communications with the courts and other law offices; answered and managed calls; greeted visitors; obtained signatures for financial documents and invoices; directed visitors to appropriate offices.

experience.title: Deputy Clerk
experience.description: Filed, prepared and maintained court files; processed warrants in debts and garnishments (high monthly volume); collected fines and costs; data entry (70+ wpm); provided court room support; used multi-line phone, fax, copier, and court system; supported board and committee meetings and staff events.

education.degree: Associate of Arts in General Studies
